name: 3D Mountain Rally Racing - eXtreme Real Dirt Road Driving Simulator Game FREE
name_original: 3D Mountain Rally Racing - eXtreme Real Dirt Road Driving Simulator Game FREE
description:
Rev up that 2.0L Turbo charged engine, it’s time to shred some dirt roads. Race as fast as you can through the canyon. Avoid rocks and other hazards and see how far you can make it before wrecking your rally car.

Features

-Realistic 3D graphics
-3 different Rally Cars
-Falling rock hazards
